turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm looking to place an order from a place called Bella Luna. It's a pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me get four small pizzas, two of them with extra cheese and the other two with pepperoni. And all four needs to have thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering 4 small pizzas with thick crust, 2 cheese, 2 pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $52, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick up, delivery or dine in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to pick this up, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great and I appreciate your help.
